Description of incident: JCM Partners informed customers of a data breach that occured when a file containing personal information of housing applicants was taken from a JCM database and posted on an unauthorized website. An internal investigation was launched.The information in the file included Social Security numbers, driver's license numbers, email addresses and mailing addresses. The company is providing 12 months of AllClear Secure and those affected are automatically eligible and can call 1-877-979-2595.
